landmark-no-duplicate-banner:
To ensure that a document has at most one banner landmark, you can use the HTML5 `
` element with the `role="banner"` attribute. The banner landmark should be used only once per page, typically for the site header or branding content. Example: ```html Example Page

Example Website

  • Home
  • About
  • Contact

Welcome to our example website

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum vehicula odio eget libero condimentum, et consequat dui tincidunt.

© 2022 Example Website. All rights reserved.

``` In this example, the `
` element with the `role="banner"` attribute is used only once to define the site header. This ensures that the document has at most one banner landmark, which helps with accessibility and navigation for screen reader users.
